name: ide-protoss
description: ProtoSS JS and Grammar support for Atom IDE

autoUpdateOnChange.title: Auto async of tokens within seconds
autoUpdateOnChange.description: Automatic update of tokens on stop changing text editor. Update is asynchronous without notifications.

breadcrumbs.title: Breadcrumbs visibility
breadcrumbs.description: Top panel describing file, meta data, descriptors and hierarchy.

console.title: Console
console.description: Output of package console.log in developer tools

project.title: Project lookup
project.description: Lookup method of protossdox.json bubbles up searching for project file in each parent folder. Limited by project/drive top folder.

xdescript.title: Extend descriptors
xdescript.description: Automatic creation of JSON descriptors will extend additional properties.

fontSize.title: Font size
fontSize.description: CSS font size of top panel

splitpanel.title: Split panel
splitpanel.description: Panel appears on two lines separating file and ProtoSS Dox project.

maxTokensPerLine.title: Maximum tokens per line
maxTokensPerLine.description: Configure any Grammar maximum line tokens per load of file in ProtoSS IDE.

notifications.title: Allow notifications
notifications.description: Notifications will popup on the screen for loaded JSON descriptors and analyzed tokens.

groupdigits.title: Allow digit grouping
groupdigits.description: Lines and tokens will appear in groups separated by space.

grammarId.title: Grammar
grammarId.description: Choose Grammar Tokenizer. Install or Enable missing ones, otherwise Null Grammar will be used. Auto will use editor grammar.

findTokenCaseSensitivity.title: Find Token case sensitivity
findTokenCaseSensitivity.description: Case Sensitive search of tokens. Token string value is always trimmed of whitespace.

autoComplete.title: Auto complete
autoComplete.description: Enable Auto-complete Service provider for File/Directory listing, JavaScript/TypeScript/HTML, ProtoSS hierarchy.

autoCompleteTypes.title: Include types in auto complete
autoCompleteTypes.description: Export property and method types from descriptors and add them to imports.

autoCompleteNS.title: Auto complete namespace
autoCompleteNS.description: Auto-complete namespace of supername as prefix from AsyncProviders appearing from ProtoSS hierarchy/inherits/imports.

autoCompleteCSS.title: Auto complete CSS
autoCompleteCSS.description: Include CSS auto-complete service by keywords.

autoCompleteHTML.title: Auto complete HTML
autoCompleteHTML.description: Include HTML auto-complete service by elements, attributes, methods.

autoCompleteSort.title: Auto complete sorting
autoCompleteSort.description: Enable sorting in auto-complete service provider.

autoBuild.title: Auto build project
autoBuild.description: Automatically build the ProtoSS project space using current Atom Project paths, upon open/add/remove new project folder.

useMultiviews.title: Use Multiviews
useMultiviews.description: Allow resolve of file tokens without extension by matching directory files and assumed extensions.

fileTimeout.title: File Timeout
fileTimeout.description: Timeout before loading JSON files of project and descriptor.

tokenTimeout.title: Token Timeout
tokenTimeout.description: Timeout before loading tokens from Grammar.

zetaret_omnipotency.title: Omnipotent Mode
zetaret_omnipotency.description: Activate ProtoSS Omnipotency. Tokenize all file extensions using selected grammar, includes Project/Dox/Descriptors/Inheritance.

styleGroupMark.title: Marker Styles

markerAllow.title: Allow highlight marker
markerAllow.description: Current token will be marked for visibility.

markerBorderType.title: Border style type
markerBorderType.description: Border size is 1px and surrounds the marker.

markerFind.title: Find markers
markerFind.description: Use current token settings to find more markers.

markerFindSkip.title: Skip punctuation in marker search
markerFindSkip.description: Single punctuation characters will not be marked in find markers cases.

styleGroupMark.description: Group of colors, borders, backgrounds, and CSS config. Marked tokens use Atom Decoration/DisplayMarker API.

breadcrumbsOptions.title: Breadcrumbs Options

filePath.title: File path
filePath.description: Show current editor path in breadcrumbs.

breadcrumbsOptions.description: Group of options to control breadcrumbs view.

autoCompleteOptions.title: Options of Auto-completion

useMethodSnippets.title: Use method snippets
useMethodSnippets.description: Parse method data from async JSON provider and use as snippet in the auto-complete block.

filePriority.title: Priority of File Provider
filePriority.description: Appearance order of file/folder auto-complete service.

basicPriority.title: Priority of Basic Provider
basicPriority.description: Appearance order of all basic auto-complete services - JS/HTML/CSS.

asyncPriority.title: Priority of Async Provider
asyncPriority.description: Appearance order of all asynchronous auto-complete services - JSON descriptors.

wordPriority.title: Priority of Word Provider
wordPriority.description: Appearance order of all word auto-complete services - text buffers.

fileProvider.title: Enable File Provider
fileProvider.description: Use File Provider in Auto-completion mode by using Basic Provider grammar types or in all grammars.

basicProvider.title: Enable Basic Provider
basicProvider.description: Use Basic Provider in Auto-completion mode by matching grammar types.

asyncProvider.title: Enable Async Provider
asyncProvider.description: Use Async Provider in Auto-completion mode by using Basic Provider grammar types or in all grammars.

wordProvider.title: Enable Word Provider
wordProvider.description: Use Word Provider in Auto-completion mode of current active text editor, same grammar type or all open buffers.

wordLength.title: Word Length
wordLength.description: Minimum length of the word from the text buffer.

mergerProvider.title: Enable Merger Provider
mergerProvider.description: Use Merger Provider to list and sort at once. Merger will use the lowest suggestion priority of the sequence.

autoCompleteOptions.description: Group of options to control auto-complete service providers.

wordRegOptions.title: Word RegExp Options

list.title: Include Unicode List
list.description: Add group of Unicode Ranges to exception list.

custom.title: Custom Unicode Range
custom.description: Additional Unicode Ranges as they appear in the Unicode List or custom selection. Separate by , [comma] in format U+0000-U+FFFF

account.title: Account Word Match
account.description: Count the word in each filename

wordRegOptions.description: Group of options to define RegExp of Word service provider. Default [\W] equals [^A-Za-z0-9_], or use Unicode Ranges in the exception list. If no include or custom is used, the default applies.
